mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeBoard (poster, subject, content, memberSeq) VALUES (#{poster}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{memberSeq})
mapper.update:
UPDATE noticeBoard
poster = #{poster},
subject = #{subject},
content = #{content},
modDt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, m.name, m.email FROM noticeBoard b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.memberSeq = m.seq ORDER BY regDt DESC
